emotions.name: Angry
emotions.desc: 'Feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility; full of anger.'

emotions.name: Disgusted
emotions.desc: 'Feeling or expressing revulsion or strong disapproval.'

emotions.name: Hurt
emotions.desc: 'Unhappiness or sadness caused by someone's words or actions'

emotions.name: Interested
emotions.desc: 'A feeling or emotion that causes attention to focus on an object, event, or process. '

emotions.name: Surprised
emotions.desc: 'One of the seven universal emotions and arises when we encounter sudden and unexpected sounds or movements'
